event.title: I ‚ô• Free Software Day in Chaos Computer Club in Frankfurt a.M., Germany

body.p: On the public evening, February 14th at the Chaos Computer Club in Frankfurt a.M., we want to celebrate the "I Love Free Software Day" ü•≥. Everyone who is interested in Free Software is invited to drop by. The doors will be open from 19:00.

In addition to a small programme with some üì¢ Lightning Talks (5 mins. each) and a üçï Pizza Party, the evening can be used to chat about Free Software. If you would like to contribute a Lightning Talk, email mweimann@fsfe.org.
